patterns: What is the passcode for SVSC voicemail?
What is the phone number of SVSC?
How to access the SVSC voicemail?
responses: Check Voicemail from SkyPro: call 404-715-9522 and when the voice answers press * and then * again and then the passcode 258000

patterns: How to block the spam call?
responses: Please follow the Steps! Texts: Open the message, tap the > icon next to phone number, tap info icon, tap info, Block the Caller, Calls: Tape the info icon next to the phone number > Block this Caller

responses: For issues with eLearning content, contact the Service Learning Team: IFSLMS.delta@delta.com or 404-715-0985. Question about CQ, ask your FSM or visit IFS Portal - deltaairlines.sharepoint.com/company/IFS/Learning/Pages/CQ-Training

patterns: How to recover the forgotten password?

responses: Apple Factory Reset is required and takes 2 hours. Email the info to the FA(see Forgotten Passcode tab). Can help unlock for special situations.

responses: Log in credentials - Device Type: Personal, Customer ID or Airline: dal, Username: 6-digit PPR, Device Name: leave blank no info needed

pp used for completing expense reports and is not managed by Delta but does require password/pin set up with Concur. Concur Support: 1-855-895-4815 or www.concursolutions.com or Delta IT Help Desk 404-714-4357

Delta security system that requires more than one method to verify the user’s identity for login. Register MFA and Ping ID app are apps on the SkyPro.
